title: The quotient map and quotient modules

blocks.name: qusker
blocks.content: The kernel of a quotient map. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-May-2023.)

thm qusker(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)), c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c4, cec(cv(s0), co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c1, cqus, co(c1, cqg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)), c0, crab(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)), crab(hs0, c4, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)))

  quslem(s0, c2, c4, co(c1, cqg, c0), c5, c1, universe, cgrp, wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c1, cqus, co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cqg, c0), universe))
  fofn(c2, c4, cqs(c4, co(c1, cqg, c0)))
  fniniseg2(hs0, c2, c4, c3)
  rabbidva(hs0, c4, wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  3bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(cec(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  eqeqan12d(c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cec(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl6reqr(c3, cec(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cfv(c0g, c5), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)))
  qus0(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c5)
  fvmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c4, c2, cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(s0), co(c1, cqg, c0)))
  eceq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0))
  ax-mp(wcel(cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), universe), wcel(co(c1, cqg, c0), universe))
  ovex(c1, cqg, c0)
  ecexg(co(c1, cqg, c0), universe, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wb(wceq(c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)))
  eqcom(c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  3bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cec(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  syl22anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wb(wbr(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  grpidcl(c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c4)
  rbaibd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))), w3a(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wb(wbr(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wb(wbr(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(c1, cgrp), wss(c0, c4))
  eqgval(c1, cgrp, c0, c4, cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0), cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  biancomi(w3a(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  df-3an(wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  erth2(cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cqg, c0), cv(hs0), c4, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wer(co(c1, cqg, c0), c4))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wer(co(c1, cqg, c0), c4), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  eqger(c0, c1, co(c1, cqg, c0), c4)
  eqid(co(c1, cqg, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  eleq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), c0, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  grpinvid(c1, cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))

  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))

  grplid(c1, cv(hs0), c4, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1))

thm qusker(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚Üí(`' c2 " { c3 })= c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶[s0](c1[~QG]c0))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c1[/s](c1[~QG]c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtrd((`' c2 " { c3 }), c0, { hs0 ‚àà c4 |(c2 ` hs0)= c3 }, { hs0 ‚àà c4 | hs0 ‚àà c0 }, c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), (`' c2 " { c3 })= { hs0 ‚àà c4 |(c2 ` hs0)= c3 }, (c2 : c4 ‚Ü†(c4 /.(c1[~QG]c0))), c2[Fn]c4)
  quslem(s0, c2, c4, (c1[~QG]c0), c5, c1, universe, cgrp, c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c5 =(c1[/s](c1[~QG]c0)))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c4 =(Base ` c1))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), (c1[~QG]c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fofn(c2, c4, (c4 /.(c1[~QG]c0)))
  fniniseg2(hs0, c2, c4, c3)
  rabbidva(hs0, c4, c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), (c2 ` hs0)= c3, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  3bitr3d((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (c2 ` hs0)= c3, hs0 ‚àà c0, c3 =(c2 ` hs0), [(0 ` c1)](c1[~QG]c0)=[hs0](c1[~QG]c0))
  eqeqan12d(c3, (c2 ` hs0), [(0 ` c1)](c1[~QG]c0), [hs0](c1[~QG]c0), c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4)
  syl6reqr(c3, [(0 ` c1)](c1[~QG]c0), (0 ` c5), c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  qus0(c0, c1, (0 ` c1), c5)
  fvmpt(s0, hs0, c4, c2, [hs0](c1[~QG]c0), [s0](c1[~QG]c0))
  eceq1(s0, hs0, (c1[~QG]c0))
  ax-mp([hs0](c1[~QG]c0)‚àà ùïå, (c1[~QG]c0)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex(c1, cqg, c0)
  ecexg((c1[~QG]c0), universe, hs0)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (c3 =(c2 ` hs0)‚Üî(c2 ` hs0)= c3))
  eqcom(c3, (c2 ` hs0))
  3bitr3d((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), [(0 ` c1)](c1[~QG]c0)=[hs0](c1[~QG]c0), hs0 ‚àà c0, (0 ` c1)[(c1[~QG]c0)]hs0, (((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0)
  syl22anc((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), ((0 ` c1)[(c1[~QG]c0)]hs0 ‚Üî(((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0), c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (0 ` c1)‚àà c4, hs0 ‚àà c4)
  3syl((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (0 ` c1)‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c1 ‚àà Grp)
  grpidcl(c1, (0 ` c1), c4)
  rbaibd((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), ((0 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (0 ` c1)[(c1[~QG]c0)]hs0, (((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0)
  syl6bb((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (0 ` c1)[(c1[~QG]c0)]hs0, ((((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0 ‚àß((0 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4)), ((0 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, ((0 ` c1)[(c1[~QG]c0)]hs0 ‚Üî((0 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0)))
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), ((0 ` c1)[(c1[~QG]c0)]hs0 ‚Üî((0 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0)), c1 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚äÜ c4)
  eqgval(c1, cgrp, c0, c4, (0 ` c1), (c1[~QG]c0), hs0, (invg ` c1), (+ ` c1))
  biancomi(((0 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0), (((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0, ((0 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  df-3an((0 ` c1)‚àà c4, hs0 ‚àà c4, (((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0)‚àà c0)
  erth2((0 ` c1), (c1[~QG]c0), hs0, c4, (c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1[~QG]c0)[Er]c4)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), (c1[~QG]c0)[Er]c4, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  eqger(c0, c1, (c1[~QG]c0), c4)
  eqid((c1[~QG]c0))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4)
  eleq1d((((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0), c0, hs0, (c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  eqtrd((((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))[(+ ` c1)]hs0), hs0, ((0 ` c1)[(+ ` c1)]hs0), (c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  oveq1d(((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1)), (+ ` c1), hs0, (0 ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  3syl((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), ((invg ` c1)`(0 ` c1))=(0 ` c1), c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c1 ‚àà Grp)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4)
  grpinvid(c1, (invg ` c1), (0 ` c1))
  eqid((invg ` c1))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, ((0 ` c1)[(+ ` c1)]hs0)= hs0, c1 ‚àà Grp)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c1 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  subgrcl(c0, c1)
  grplid(c1, hs0, c4, (0 ` c1), (+ ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), { hs0 ‚àà c4 | hs0 ‚àà c0 } = c0, c0 ‚äÜ c4)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ c4, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  nsgsubg(c0, c1)
  subgss(c0, c1, c4)
  dfss7(hs0, c0, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (NrmSGrp ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnsg, c1)
  diff.cnsg.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  diff.cec.s(s0, hs0, (c1[~QG]c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cqg, c0)

blocks.name: eqgvscpbl
blocks.content: The left coset equivalence relation is compatible with the scalar multiplication operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqgvscpbl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(co(c3, c4, c0), c1, co(c3, c4, c2))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c6, cqg, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c6)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cfv(clss, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c8))
} = {

blocks.name: imaslmod
blocks.content: The image structure of a left module is a left module. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-May-2023.)

blocks.name: quslmod
blocks.content: If ` G ` is a submodule in ` M ` , then ` N = M / G ` is a left module, called the quotient module of ` M ` by ` G ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm quslmod(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, clmod))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, cqus, co(c1, cqg, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, clmod))

blocks.name: quslmhm
blocks.content: If ` G ` is a submodule of ` M ` , then the "natural map" from elements to their cosets is a left module homomorphism from ` M ` to ` M / G ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2023.)
